name: SpaceshipEscape
description:
this is my 2d platformer project. I made some additions to the base version:

  • created 4 different levels
  • created a script and an art for portals that can teleport the player
  • made it so if your hp is full, the next health pickup will add an extra life
  • changed the pause menu to add a restar button
  • added one way platforms
  • added text to a few enemies

created by:

Cao Guim
